description.value: Your dragon wings are now a permanent part of your body, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. If you spend 1 Focus Point to cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Dragon Wings]{Dragon Wings}, your fly Speed increases to 90 feet for the duration, unless your Speed is faster, and you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Dragon Claws]{Dragon Claws} for the duration.
